add.name: db
add.connectionString: Server=[Database server name];Port=31436;Database=[Database name]; User ID=[Name of the user who will connect to the DB];password=[Password of the user who will connect to the DB];Timeout=500; CommandTimeout=400;MaxPoolSize=1024;

add.name: influx
add.connectionString: url=[Address of the analytics collection service]; user=; password=; batchIntervalMs=5000

add.name: messageBroker
add.connectionString: amqp://[MessageBroker username]:[Password]@[Address of the server where the service is deployed]/[Virtual server name]
